report.title: Peer Evaluation for ${FirstName} ${LastName}, PhD 2016-2017 Academic Year
report.paragraph:
Teaching
Dr. ${LastName} taught ${FallHours} hours (${FallCourses}) in the fall and ${SpringHours} hours (${SpringCourses}) in the spring. During the 2015-2016 academic year, Dr. ${LastName} was classified as research active/inactive. If applicable, additional adjustments to workload are listed here:
